subject: Application crashes when generating monthly reports
description: When attempting to generate monthly sales reports for December 2024, the application freezes and crashes. This is affecting our end-of-year closing process.

activities.author: System
activities.note: Ticket automatically created from customer portal

activities.author: System
activities.note: Assigned to David Thompson - Enterprise Support

activities.author: David Thompson
activities.note: Reproduced the issue. Appears to be related to date range calculations. Escalating to development team.

activities.author: David Thompson
activities.note: Development team has identified the bug. Fix scheduled for release 5.2.2 tomorrow. Providing workaround to customer.
